multiplication_galaxy.title: GALAXY MULTIPLIER
multiplication_galaxy.mission_intro: Commander! The stars are scattered across the sector. We need your help to group them and power up the hyperdrive!
multiplication_galaxy.fueling_instruction: Load the fuel pods! We need {pods} pods with {stars} stars each.
multiplication_galaxy.matrix_instruction: Build a core with {target} power units!
multiplication_galaxy.drag_instruction: Drag to select a rectangular area
multiplication_galaxy.warp_instruction: Select ALL pairs that equal {target} to open the gate!
